title: Basic curry sauce
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons groundnut oil', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 large onion, thinly sliced', '1 (3cm piece) fresh ginger, peeled and minced', '1 or 2 garlic cloves, peeled and minced', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '2 tablespoons ground coriander', '2 tablespoons ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '2 tomatoes, chopped', '2 red chillies, seeded', '30g fresh coriander leaves', '100ml cream', '750ml water']
